field.label: Authors (required)
field.hint: Enter the names of individual or full corporate authors of this item. Enter each individually.

field.label: CGIAR author ORCID iDs
field.hint: Enter ORCID iDs for CGIAR authors. Click below to see a pre-populated list of author ORCID iDs that you can select from. Enter one per author. If an iD is missing, enter a new one in the exact same format (Name: 0000-0002-1735-7458). Use the exact name style the author uses at https://orcid.org

field.label: Author affiliations
field.hint: Click below to see a pre-populated list of author affiliations, or enter the full name of the institutions that the author(s) work for (enter each individually).

field.label: Authorship types
field.hint: Characterize the entire authorship based on author affilations.

field.label: Title (required)
field.hint: Enter the full official title of the item (including any subtitles, etc).
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Journal title
field.hint: Click below to see a pre-populated list of journal titles, or enter the full journal title manually.

field.label: Edition
field.hint: Enter the edition of the item (3rd, 17th, Revised).

field.label: Pagination
field.hint: Enter the page range for an article or chapter (10-17); or the total pages for a report (120 p.).

field.label: Other titles
field.hint: Enter any alternative titles for the item (other languages, etc).

field.label: Item type (required)
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "Ctrl" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Publication place
field.hint: NOT for journal articles. Enter the city and country, for example: Nairobi, Kenya

field.label: Date of publication (required)
field.hint: Enter the date when the item was published or made public.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: NOT for journal articles. Enter the full name of the publisher.

field.label: Citation (required)
field.hint: Enter the standard citation.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the full official series name and number.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: Enter any associated identification numbers or codes.

field.label: URL
field.hint: Enter a full URL for the item.

field.label: Google book URL
field.hint: Enter a full URL for the item.

field.label: Bioversity publications permanent link
field.hint: Enter a full URL for the item.

field.label: Document Object Identifier (DOI)
field.hint: Enter the full address (append https://dx.doi.org/ before the DOI).

field.label: CGIAR Research Programs (CRP)
field.hint: Select any CGIAR Research Program(s) associated with this item. Use this to show that a CRP funded this item.

field.label: Country
field.hint: Select a country or countries within the scope of the item. To select more than one country, you have to hold down the "Ctrl" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Region
field.hint: Select a region or regions within the scope of the item. To select more than one region, you have to hold down the "Ctrl" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Subregion
field.hint: Click below to see a pre-populated list of subregions — normally provinces, states, regions, etc WITHIN a country (or enter a new one in UPPER CASE).

field.label: River basin
field.hint: Select the focus basin(s).

field.label: AGROVOC keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases.

field.label: Notes
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: Review status
field.hint: Indicate whether it has undergone internal or peer review.

field.label: Target audience
field.hint: Indicate the main audience for whom the item is produced.

field.label: Accessibility status (required)
field.hint: Indicate the accessibility of the item.

field.label: Usage rights (required)
field.hint: Usage rights for this work.
field.required: Please indicate the license terms for using this work.

field.label: Sponsor
field.hint: Enter full institution name(s) who sponsored the item. Click below to see a pre-populated list, or add one manually. CGIAR Research Program funding is identified in the field above.

field.label: Related video
field.hint: Enter related video link (eg a video about this item).

field.label: Related audio
field.hint: Enter related audio link (eg an audio about this item).

field.label: Related photo
field.hint: Enter related photo link (eg a photo or image associated with this item).

field.label: Related reference
field.hint: Enter related reference link (normally a URL to another item).

field.label: Related citation
field.hint: Enter related reference citation (normally a full citation, not a URL).

field.label: URL for datafile
field.hint: Enter a URL for any associated datafile, in a repository for example.

field.label: Species
field.hint: Enter scientific name of organism, plant, animal, etc if it is a main focus of the item, for example: Lablab purpureus; Bos Taurus; Oryza sativa; Theileria parva)

field.label: Voice message
field.hint: Enter a voice message text that would be recorded for extension.

field.label: SMS message
field.hint: Enter an SMS message that would be distributed on mobile services.

field.label: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item.

field.label: Journal Title
field.hint: Enter Journal Title.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Citation (required)
field.hint: Enter the standard citation.

field.label: Document Object Identifier (DOI)
field.hint: Enter the full address (append https://dx.doi.org/ before the DOI).

field.label: URL
field.hint: Enter the URL.

field.label: Date of Publication
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the full name of the publisher (reports and books only).

field.label: Item type (required)
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "Ctrl" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Publication place
field.hint: Enter the city and country, for example: Nairobi, Kenya

field.label: Accessibility status
field.hint: Please select either Open Access or Limited Access.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.
